activity.title: Activity
activity.edit: Changed the permission to edit information {member}.

message.moveTrashSure: Are you sure you want to move the project to the Trash?
message.moveTrashSuccess: Project has been moved to trash.
message.deleteSure:
Are you sure you want to move the project to trash?
Deleted projects are not restored.
message.deleteNotExist: Selected project does not exist in the Workspace. Please check again.
message.updateShareSuccess: Sharing status of the project has been changed
message.updateShareFail: Failed to edit project sharing status.
message.updateShareMemberSuccess: Project share designation Member has been set.
message.updateShareMemberFail: Failed to set project share designation Member.
message.updateShareMemberNotExist: Only Workspace Members can be set as shared designated Members.
message.updateEditFail: Failed to change project edit permission settings.
message.updateEditMemberSuccess: Project edit designation Member has been set.
message.updateEditMemberNotExist: Only Workspace Members can be set as edit-designated Members.
message.updateNotExist: Selected project does not exist in the workspace. Please check again.
message.backup: Moved deleted project to the project list.
message.deleteFailsPhrase: The specified project file cannot be found or you do not have editing rights.
message.sharePermissionRelease: The sharing permission for that project has been lifted.​
message.editPermissionRelease: Editing rights for that project have been revoked.​
message.downloadFailMaxSize: The file cannot be downloaded because the file size exceeds {0}MB.
message.downloadFailsPhrase: You do not have download rights for that project.

download.title: Downloading file
download.desc:
The selected file is being downloaded.
Do not close your browser until finished.
